content: the foundation chains 3sc 1inc round 2 2inc 2sc 4inc 2sc 2inc 20 round 3 1sc 1inc 4sc 1sc 1inc *3 4sc 1sc 1inc *2 26 round 4-5 26sc * 2rnds 26 work 1sc and move stitch marker this is new round beginning round 6 8sc 2dec 2sc 2dec 8sc 22 round 7 7sc 4dec 7sc 18 round 8 5sc 4dec 5sc 14 round 9-18 14sc * 10rnds 14 insert plastic joint into the leg with pin outside insert pins 2rnds below top edge and from inner sides of leg mirror please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=1m23s do not secure pin with plastic washer yet round 19 7dec 7 close the hole please see pattern tips toyfoxstore etsy com 4 forelegs make 2 worked in the round from bottom up start with col a stuff as you go please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=2m47s round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 6inc 12 round 3 2sc 1inc *4 16 round 4-5 16sc * 2rnds 16 round 6 3sc 1inc 6sc 2dec 2sc 15 round 7 4sc 1inc 6sc 1dec 2sc 15 round 8 11sc 1dec 2sc 14 round 9 14sc 14 round 10 11sc 1dec 1sc 13 round 11 13sc 13 round 12 11sc 1dec 12 round 13-18 12sc * 6rnds 12 insert plastic joint into the arm with pin outside as for hind legs please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=1m23s do not secure pin with plastic washer yet round 19 1dec 3sc 1dec 5sc 10 round 20 5dec 5 close the hole please see pattern tips toyfoxstore etsy com 5 head worked in the round from nose tip to back of the head start with yarn in col b please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=3m26s round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 6inc 12 round 3 2sc 4inc 2sc 4inc 20 round 4 4sc 3inc 7sc 3inc 3sc 26 round 5-6 26sc * 2rnds 26 switch to yarn in col a mark stitches before and after half_double_crochet-increases in next round to insert safety eyes further i used contrasting color thread please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=4m32s round 7 10sc 2hdc *7 9sc 33 round 8 1inc 7sc 1inc 1sc 2hdc 2hdc 1hdc *6 1hdc 1sc 1inc 6sc 42 round 9 1sc 1inc 7sc 1inc *2 4sc 1inc *2 8sc 1inc 5sc 48 round 10 15sc 1inc 6sc *4 5sc 52 round 11 22sc 1inc 10sc 1inc 18sc 54 round 12-20 54sc * 9rnds 54 insert safety eyes at round 7 in marked places secure them with plastic washers please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=6m32s insert safety nose with attached long black thread between rnds 4 and 5 between eyes and secure it with plastic washer please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=7m59s insert plastic joint d=35-40mm please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu
